Question: AFWERX @ Dept of the Air Force (USAF/USSF) CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AFWERX @ Dept of the Air Force (USAF/USSF)

Product Highlight: AFVentures

 - Funds emerging technologies for Air Force and Space Force capabilities
 - Attracts and scales small businesses through government and private capital
 - Accelerates agile and affordable capability transitions with innovative technology

Additional Information:

 - AFWERX is the innovation arm and a directorate within the Air Force Research Laboratory (AFRL)
 - Established in 2017 to address the most pressing challenges of the Department of the Air Force
 - Focuses on broadening access to disruptive innovation and transforming the national security innovation base
 - Announced the formation of SpaceWERX to focus on technologies for the United States Space Force
 - Executing a more than $1 billion annual budget with increased funding opportunities aligned with the DAF Operational Imperatives

Note: AFWERX will participate in the Small Business Administration
Summary_cn:
美国空军部门（USAF/USSF）下的AFWERX

产品亮点：AFVentures

- 为空军和太空部队的能力投资新兴技术
- 通过政府和私人资本吸引和扩大小企业规模
- 利用创新技术加速灵活且负担得起的能力转移

额外信息：

- AFWERX是空军研究实验室（AFRL）内的创新部门和指导机构
- 成立于2017年，旨在解决空军部门最紧迫的挑战
- 专注于扩大对颠覆性创新的获取，并转变国家安全创新基地
- 宣布成立SpaceWERX，专注于美国太空部队的技术
- 按照空军部门操作要求，执行逾10亿美元的年度预算，提供更多资金机会

备注：AFWERX将参与小型企业管理局的活动。
